item.title: About
item.description:
# ğŸ‘‹ About This Site

This is the official **Notice Page** powered by the *Osprey Delight* theme.

It serves as a communication hub for sharing information about login guides,

events, and coupon management for Bitspace users.

## Main Features

- Step-by-step **login instructions**

- A list of **current and upcoming events**

- User **coupon management** and benefits

item.title: Notice
item.description:
# ğŸ“¢ Announcements

## ğŸ” How to Log In

1. Click the **Login** button on the top-right corner.

2. Sign in using your email or a linked social account (Google, Kakao, etc).

3. After logging in, your personalized dashboard will appear.
